position.title: JS Full Stack Developer - Integration Team
position.description: We're looking for a Full Stack Developer to develop product interfaces for the different Hermez integrations with our partnersâ€™ applications. You'll work with different engineering teams to design, spec, and implement Web Apps and APIs that showcase the potential of the Hermez network, as well as optimizing and improving the backend to adapt to new requirements.
responsibilities: Design and implement quality frontend and backend architectures that connect with blockchain platforms like Hermez and Ethereum.
Work with our design, product teams and partners to transform ideas and designs into great products.
Develop high-quality, performant, modern, clean and readable code within tight deadlines.
Take ownership of the development and maintenance of the project from ideation to deployment.
Work with the engineering, design, and product teams collaboratively, contributing ideas that add value to our product roadmap and company goals.
skills: Minimum 3 years experience in software development.
Strong experience in designing and implementing quality apps.
Experience working with modern JavaScript tools like ES6+, Vue, React, Angular development tools, and service APIs.
Working knowledge of web3, ethers, truffle and/or hardhat is a plus.
Develop high-quality, performant, modern, clean and readable code.
Good written and verbal communication skills in English.
niceToHave: Experienced working in projects using cryptography, complex maths and complex database structures.
Familiar with existing L2 blockchain solutions.
